title: Update merge command help text to mention ParentBranch
description: In cmd/tk/cmd/merge.go:20, the Long help text says 'merge into main branch' but doesn't mention that it respects ParentBranch for worktrees created from feature branches.
closed_reason: Updated merge command Short description and Long help text to reference 'target branch' instead of 'main branch', and added explanation that worktrees created from feature branches merge back to ParentBranch
